name: Programming Practice
body:
### Welcome
This repo contains my solutions to UVA problems I solve as I train to become a better programmer. 

### About Me
My name is Santiago. I am a student of Computer Sciences and Maths at Los Andes University, in Bogota, Colombia. I love programming and programming contests. 
[Find me on LinkedIn](https://co.linkedin.com/in/santiagoceron)

### Errata
Please contact me if you find any faulty code or have any question at santiago-ceron@outlook.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
